content: अभ्युपपद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To deliver (from distress), protect; to console, comfort, take compassion or pity on, pity, favour; रतिमभ्युपपत्तुमातुरां मधुरात्मानमदर्शयत्पुरः <ls>Ku. 4. 25</ls>; (कदा) तपःकृशामभ्युपपत्स्यते सखीं वृषेव सीतां तदवग्रहक्षतां <ls n="Ku.">5. 61</ls>; <ls>U. 2</ls>, <ls n="U.">3</ls>, <ls n="U.">7</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To ask for help, seek protection, submit; अभ्युपपन्नवत्सलः <ls>Mk. 7.</ls> {@--3@} To furnish with.
